bibl.seg: Tait John Gavin and Claire Préaux (edited by), Greek Ostraca in the Bodleian Library at Oxford and Various Other Collections. Volume III. Indexes (compiled by Jean Bingen and Martin Wittek). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 43).
